entities.name: riddle
entities.description: poor but brilliant, parentless but so brave

relationships.description: Dumbledore never seemed to like Harry as much as the other teachers did
Riddle was surprised how well a plan involving Hagrid worked
Dumbledore persuaded Dippet to keep Hagrid and train him as gamekeeper
Harry disagreed with Riddle, saying 'I bet Dumbledore saw right through you'
